name: Gun Clappers
description:
its like ROUNDS but without the rounds, shoot players over multiplayer, collect the shiny card shards, unlock cards to build op loadout.

you can wall climb but if your going too fast you slip.

also DONT TOUCH THE EDGE OF THE MAP YOU DIE INSTANTLY, itll do some amount of damage instead of instant death in a future update

To join the game: 

enter a name and press enter

then to make a channel (a game room) just type whatever random thing in and press enter, have your friends type the same thing in to join you
